text: Somi Nanda Ratnayake (born October 27, 1946 as සොමී රත්නායක) [Sinhala]), also known as Somi Ratnayake, is a Sri Lankan actor in Sri Lankan cinema, stage drama and television. Highly versatile actor with a career spanning more than four decades, Rathnayake is a multi-talented personnel also working as a script writer and film producer. ==Acting career== He directed the stage drama Ran Salakunu. ===Selected television serials=== * Haye Pahara ==Filmography== Rathnayake started his film career with 1975 film Amaraneeya Adare directed by Dayananda Jayawardane. Then he contributed in several critically acclaimed films such as Suddilage Kathawa, Surabidena, Sathkampa, and Parawarthana. ===As Actor=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Film !! Role !!
